content.prompt: Which of the following statements accurately describes Muslim populations in two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries?

choices.label: The Muslim population constitutes a large majority in Nigeria, while in China most Muslims live in southeastern provinces.
The Muslim population in Russia mostly live in Siberia, while in Iran most of the population is Sunni Muslim.
The Muslim population in Nigeria live in the south, while in Iran most of the population is Shia Muslim.
The Muslim population in the United Kingdom lives mostly in London and other urban areas, while in China most Muslims live in western provinces.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
